Inc.","details":"Enables separation of governance (owners) from operations (signers) Key Concepts: - Owners: Full control, can do anything (governance layer) - Signers: Role-limited access, can only call functions their role permits (operational layer) Use Cases: - Law firms with clerks executing specific operations for clients - Investment funds with portfolio managers having limited trading authority - Corporate treasuries with AP clerks having payment-only access - DAOs with core contributors having delegated execution
